content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of boiler (position -11.5, 25.0) and steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5) connected by pipes. The offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5) is connected to the boiler.

### Pipes
Consists of the following entities:
- Pipe (position -9.5, 19.5) - Status: FULL_OUTPUT
- Pipe (position -13.5, 20.5) - Status: EMPTY
- Pipe (position -11.5, 23.5) - Status: EMPTY

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when reconnecting boiler to steam engine
- Ensure that the pipes are placed correctly and that there are no obstructions or incorrect connections before attempting to reconnect.

### Errors when connecting offshore pump to boiler
- Verify that the connection points are clear and that the pipes are correctly aligned to avoid connection failures.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
